remarks: Lemma for ~ gchac (obsolete, used in Sierpiński's proof). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
statement:
gchaclem.1 $e |- ( ph -> _om ~<_ A ) $.
gchaclem.3 $e |- ( ph -> ~P C e. GCH ) $.
gchaclem.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A ~<_ C /\ ( B ~<_ ~P C -> ~P A ~<_ B ) ) ) $.
gchaclem $p |- ( ph -> ( A ~<_ ~P C /\ ( B ~<_ ~P ~P C -> ~P A ~<_ B ) ) ) $.
